db

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.DBConnection

  • public class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    A class responsible for connection to the database, the class uses the java methods, Callable Statement and PreparedStatement to avoid syntactical errors when executing SQL statements in the database through java.
